channel.title: stories on The Herald
channel.description: Recent content in stories on The Herald

item.title: The Lion and the Mouse
item.description: ONCE when a Lion was asleep a little Mouse began running up and down upon him; this soon wakened the Lion, who placed his huge paw upon him, and opened his big jaws to swallow him.

item.title: The Fox and the Crow
item.description: A Fox once saw a Crow fly off with a piece of cheese in its beak and settle on a branch of a tree.
